00054 /*********************************************************************/
00058 #define ADC_CR_CH_SEL(n)        ((1UL << n))
00059 
00061 #define ADC_CR_CLKDIV(n)        ((n<<8))
00062 
00063 #define ADC_CR_BURST            ((1UL<<16))
00064 
00065 #define ADC_CR_PDN                      ((1UL<<21))
00066 
00067 #define ADC_CR_START_MASK       ((7UL<<24))
00068 
00069 #define ADC_CR_START_MODE_SEL(SEL)      ((SEL<<24))
00070 
00071 #define ADC_CR_START_NOW        ((1UL<<24))
00072

00074

00076

00143 /* ------------------- CHECK PARAM DEFINITIONS ------------------------- */
00145 #define PARAM_ADCx(n)    (((uint32_t *)n)==((uint32_t *)LPC_ADC))
00146 
00148 #define PARAM_ADC_START_ON_EDGE_OPT(OPT)    ((OPT == ADC_START_ON_RISING)||(OPT == ADC_START_ON_FALLING))
00149 
00151 #define PARAM_ADC_DATA_STATUS(OPT)    ((OPT== ADC_DATA_BURST)||(OPT== ADC_DATA_DONE))
00152 
00154 #define PARAM_ADC_RATE(rate)    ((rate>0)&&(rate<=200000))
00155 
00157 #define PARAM_ADC_CHANNEL_SELECTION(SEL)        ((SEL == ADC_CHANNEL_0)||(ADC_CHANNEL_1)\
00158 ||(SEL == ADC_CHANNEL_2)|(ADC_CHANNEL_3)\
00159 ||(SEL == ADC_CHANNEL_4)||(ADC_CHANNEL_5)\
00160 ||(SEL == ADC_CHANNEL_6)||(ADC_CHANNEL_7))
00161 
00163 #define PARAM_ADC_START_OPT(OPT)    ((OPT == ADC_START_CONTINUOUS)||(OPT == ADC_START_NOW)\
00164 ||(OPT == ADC_START_ON_EINT0)||(OPT == ADC_START_ON_CAP01)\
00165 ||(OPT == ADC_START_ON_MAT01)||(OPT == ADC_START_ON_MAT03)\
00166 ||(OPT == ADC_START_ON_MAT10)||(OPT == ADC_START_ON_MAT11))
00167 
00169 #define PARAM_ADC_TYPE_INT_OPT(OPT)    ((OPT == ADC_ADINTEN0)||(OPT == ADC_ADINTEN1)\
00170 ||(OPT == ADC_ADINTEN2)||(OPT == ADC_ADINTEN3)\
00171 ||(OPT == ADC_ADINTEN4)||(OPT == ADC_ADINTEN5)\
